video.title: Tom Cruise & Jada Pinkett Smith sneak into Katie Holmes play
video.description: While red carpet photographers awaited celebrity arrivals to Katie Holmes opening night of 'All My Sons' on Broadway, we exclusively spotted Tom Cruise with Jada Pinkett Smith, sneaking into the back door of the theater. We're not sure if Tom and Jada were trying to avoid the Scientology protesters who were gathered only feet away from the red carpet, or if Tom was just tired of the recent media claims that he always steals the spotlight from Katie's performances.
